select c.CAFE_ID AS cafeId, c.CAFE_NAME AS cafeName, r.REVIEW_CONTENTS AS content, r.REVIEW_DATE AS createdDate from CAFE_INFO c join REVIEW r on c.CAFE_ID = r.CAFE_ID where r.EMAIL= #{email} order by r.REVIEW_DATE desc
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT REVIEW_ID FROM review WHERE email = #{email}) AS total

SELECT c.CAFE_ID AS cafeId, c.MAIN_IMAGE AS mainImage, c.CAFE_NAME AS cafeName, CONCAT(c.ADDRESS, ' ', c.DETAIL_ADDRESS) AS address, ROUND(IFNULL(AVG(r.STAR_SCORE), 0.0), 1) AS avgStar, COUNT(r.REVIEW_ID) AS reviewCount FROM CAFE_INFO c LEFT JOIN REVIEW r ON c.CAFE_ID = r.CAFE_ID WHERE c.EMAIL = #{email} GROUP BY c.CAFE_ID
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT cafe_id FROM cafe_info WHERE email = #{email}) AS total
